resources.string: Are you sure you want to do this?
You\'ve already cheated on this question
Canberra is the capital of Australia
The dead sea is so dense that you float to the top
Some cities in Canada offer public refrigerators to citizens full of beer
Greenland was named after the great green hills that make up the territory
In Japan it is considered rude to get food from a vending machine and wander as you eat it
Hannah Montana is originally from Montana
